```{r}
library(rlang)
library(lobstr)

lobstr::ast(f(x, "y", 1))   # knitr complains about character

lobstr::ast(
    f(g(1, 2), h(3, 4, i()))
)


lobstr::ast(
    f(g(h(2)))
)

# 18.2.3 infix
x = 2
y <- x * 10

# as prefix
`<-`(y, `*`(x, 10))

lobstr::ast(
        `<-`(y, `*`(x, 10))
)
```
